name: ant-design-pro
description: An out-of-box UI solution for enterprise applications

scripts.presite: npm run generate-mock && cd functions && npm install
scripts.start:dev: cross-env SERVER_URL=http://localhost:8000    API_URL=http://39.108.86.241:9202 IXAM_URL=https://ixam.azure-api.cn DSHOW_URL=http://39.108.86.241:9201 APP_TYPE=site umi dev

scripts.start:pro: cross-env SERVER_URL=http://localhost:8000    API_URL=http://47.95.219.105:9200 IXAM_URL=https://ixam.azure-api.cn DSHOW_URL=http://47.94.253.27:9200  APP_TYPE=site umi dev
scripts.start:global: cross-env SERVER_URL=http://localhost:8000    API_URL=http://13.64.100.46:9200  IXAM_URL=http://13.64.100.46:9500  DSHOW_URL=http://13.64.100.46:9200  APP_TYPE=site umi dev

scripts.site: npm run presite && cross-env APP_TYPE=site npm run build && firebase deploy
scripts.lint: eslint --ext .js src mock tests && npm run lint:style
scripts.lint:fix: eslint --fix --ext .js src mock tests && npm run lint:style
